83172.summary: Some customers in the Garden Village area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83172.title: Sept 19 - Burnaby (Garden Village) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
